attributes.title: ✨🧚🏽‍♀️💕
attributes.review: Highly unrecommended the app says it works for my phone and it doesn’t 😔 it made my whole phone slow and after I deleted the app there was still leftover ✨𝓬𝓱𝓮𝓮𝓽𝓸 𝓭𝓾𝓼𝓽✨it was very offensive bc it says age 17+ only can have the app 😡so if someone is 16 and has very strong opinions about our lovely ✨𝓬𝓱𝓮𝓮𝓽𝓸 𝓹𝓻𝓮𝓼𝓲𝓭𝓮𝓷𝓽✨ they are being silenced😡😡😡😡😡

attributes.title: Overrated
attributes.review: I honestly just downloaded this app to see what it was about but it kept spamming me with messages asking why I didn’t respond to the previous one. Honestly disappointed that the only things they asked me for were my credit card number and if I would support trump for 2020.

attributes.title: ABSOLUTELY DISGUSTING
attributes.review: this app should be BANNED  from the united states. WHY DO THEY THINK THEY HAVE TO DELETE TIK TOK WHEN THIS MONSTROSITY EXISTS. our unfortunate president is actual trash and DOES NOT deserve HiS oWn aPp. like seriously why in the name of god does he need it for?? as far as im concerned no other president has pulled this stunt. Trump literally took his title in office and turned it into a big joke over the past four years. TRUMP 2020 😘😘😘 in a CASKET 🤪🤪🤪🎉🎉⚰️⚰️⚰️⚰️

attributes.title: THIS APP IS ✨ horrible ✨
attributes.review: The second I downloaded this app my phone started glitching. I thought maybe it’s because of the storage but I realize I have 70g left so that’s not the problem. The problem was that this app was hacking my address and after putting my phone number at the beginning I got HUNDREDS OF TEXTS. 😩✋

attributes.title: Do better mr President
attributes.review:
All these “enter phone number” prompts are super invasive. I’m poor and can’t afford health care OR a phone. I’m struggling to buy food and pay rent during this pandemic and I wanted to get away from twitter, but now ur blockin me from supporting you in a safe place. 

This is truly frustrating. 
But it’s ok, I’m still praying and wishing well for you mr president. 
🇺🇸

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: This app took my info and put me on text and call lists for weeks! After a while I got sick of it and tried to get off the lists but then my Iphone xR shut down. I took it to the apple store and they told me it was wiped. This app took my information and deleted almost everything on my phone. DO NOT GET THIS APP!!!!!

attributes.title: AWFUL AND COMPLETELY MISLEADING
attributes.review: I downloaded this app thinking it was for trumps campaign but instead it gave my phone a horrible virus and I had to smash my phone with a hammer several times just to get rid of it. If i could rate this app 0 stars I would, this app is Trumps way of getting our information and sharing it with China DO NOT DOWNLOAD, IT MAKES YOUR PHONE REALLY HOT AND WILL GIVE YOU SECOND DEGREE BURNS!!!!

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: This is literally the worst app EVER. I just wanted to support my cheeto president who is NOT AT ALL racist, homophobic, sexist, or a rapist. It took 3 WEEKS to download!!!! And then when i finally got to open the app, it glitched my phone and uninstalled all of my applications!!!! And deleted all of my photos!!!!! UGH now democrat’s will have something over us, they are just ❄️❄️❄️❄️ anyways TURNIP 2020🇲🇾

attributes.title: Ewwww don’t download this app
attributes.review: Horrible app I don’t want to have a white racist clown but still it took tooo long to download and I thought I would be able to enter Immediately but no I had to put my phone number which I didn’t do and just deleted the app since it just was not good at all don’t get this app please don’t

attributes.title: scary
attributes.review:
i honestly wish i could rate this app 0 stars. it took 4 days to completely download, and once it did, the whole app froze. i figured i could swipe out of it, but no. my whole phone was frozen. i had to bring my phone to apple (which was hard due to this fake news virus!) anyways, the apple employee said that my phone was unfixable, but they could salvage the parts! so i then got a new phone, and once again tried to get the trump 2020 app. the same thing happened again!!! anyways, i’m on phone #6, really hopeful this time.

#byedon 2020
